Description: Defendant's age in years
The type of crime a defendant has been charged with, either M (misdemeanor, less serious) or F (felony, more serious)
Defendant's race (categorical)
Defendant's biological sex (Male/Female)
How long between when a defendant was charged and when they were released. Often determined by a judge's decision of whether the defendant is at risk of recidivating.
Thresholded version of length_of_stay variable, where values above 30 have been capped at 30
Count for number of prior times a defendant has been charged
Indicator variable derived from priors_count, 1 if priors_count=1, 0 otherwise
Indicator variable derived from priors_count, 1 if priors_count is 2, 3, 4; 0 otherwise
Indicator variable derived from priors_count, 1 if priors_count=5 or more, 0 otherwise
Count for number of times a defendant was charged with a felony as a juvenile
Count for number of times a defendant was charged with a misdemeanor as a juvenile
Count for number of times a defendant was charged with something else as a juvenile
Indicator variable derived from juv_fel_count, 1 if juv_fel_count, is 1 or more; 0 otherwise
Indicator variable derived from juv_misd_count, 1 if juv_misd_count, is 1 or more; 0 otherwise
Indicator variable derived from juv_other_count, 1 if juv_other_count, is 1 or more; 0 otherwise
Indicator variable derived from c_charge_desc, indicating our best guess as to whether the crime charged was drug-related
Indicator variable derived from c_charge_desc, indicating our best guess as to whether the crime charged was violence or aggression related
Indicator variable derived from c_charge_desc, indicating our best guess as to whether the crime charged was theft or burglary related
Specific text field with type of charge. A few variables derived from this field have also been provided.
Low/Medium/High risk score category, based on COMPAS algorithm output.
1-10 COMPAS algorithm output score based on decile.
True outcome variable of whether or not defendant recidivated within 2 years
